main event: A white object was observed traveling from east to west near Waldorf, Maryland on July 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 1 minute before it disappeared from view,The observer described the object as small and round, about 2-3 inches in diameter,The sky was reported as clear at the time of the sighting,The object emitted no sound and had a glowing white appearance,The observer was alone and reported their sighting to their mother immediately after.
witness description: a 12-year-old male who used a small telescope to observe the object
